title: Councils can double savings if government invests in prevention (LGA - Local Government Association)
text: ( Source : LGA - Local Government Association ) For every Â£1 spent on programmes to keep people healthy, almost double could be saved for the public purse within five years, LGA analysis for the Spending Review reveals today. The Local
